recipe.title: Flo's Pumpkin Scones

steps.step: Put butter, salt and sugar in mix master, then add egg followed by mashed pumpkin.
Finally add by hand sifted self-raising flour. Don't handle mix too much.
Drop onto baking sheet.(~1/2 cup per scone)
Cook in very hot oven 250°C/450°F for 15-20 minutes.

recipe.comment: If using very dry pumpkin, may need 2 taplespoons milk.
